ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
ack.p: P.P. and C.G.T. are Members of COST Action EU‐CARDIOPROTECTION CA16225. C.P. and P.P. report grants from the University of Torino, Ricerca Locale Ex‐60% (Grants: PAGP_RILO_16_01; PENC_RILO) and from MIUR (PAGP_FFABR_17_01 and by PENC_FFABR_17_01). C.G.T. reports personal fees from Alere, outside the submitted work. V.M. reports a grant from SIC/MSD, outside the submitted work.
